name: The Dawn of the Epic Legend of the Tales of the Legendary Power Mage: The Reckoning
name_original: The Dawn of the Epic Legend of the Tales of the Legendary Power Mage: The Reckoning
description:
The Dawn of the Epic Legend of the Tales of the Legendary Power Mage: The Reckoning is a fast-paced single-player 3D  game for PC where you play as a powerful wizard in a magic castle, fight enemies to collect score and seek crystals to customize your spells.

The game is developed by team Ukkosstruck, one of the biggest full time student's teams of Kajaani University of Applied Sciences, Finland. The team worked on this project for the entire year of 2019. Ukkosstruck is an international team of 12 developers from Finland, Thailand and Nepal. From the ideation process to the release of  the game, total of 15 people have been working in the team.

Intallation Instruction

  • Download game that matches your OS .      
  • Extract the zip file .            
  • Open the executable file.    

And you are good to go.  

Gameplay Controls

  • WASD for movement. 
  • Space to jump. 
  • Shift Hold to double jump.
  • Right Click, Scroll Wheel Click,  Left Click for casting the spells.

It is recommended to play the game with mouse with scroll button so that you can use all three different basic spells.       

Manual

Your goal is to survive as long as possible and get a high score. You collect crystals by destroying glowing chests. Crystals allow you to buff your spells. Once you've found 3 crystals, you can access the boss battle area through a special door. When you defeat the boss, a new level is generated with new crystals and new boss battle area.

Known issues

  • The crystal chests and the boss door are difficult to find
  • SFX volume piles up, destroying audio balance
  • Low fps is possible
